I wi try some things and if I can make it rigid without dependencies or a small less than 1mb mm patch or something
it does, for some time there was a bug that they even wouldn't undock

Careful Mike btw KIS and KAS are two different mods, you want to use KIS. As for wobbly ports, I guess that's a good point. KIS isn't fussy about what type of node you use, so you could get away with no docking ports at all, and just sticking a node at each end. If people want to dock, they can use the CBM ports or something, and if not they can use KIS to node attach. be aware that if you choose to use KIS, you'll likely want to include support for adding KIS inventories to some of the parts; maybe the quest airlock? Not saying to do this right away, but if you give KIS a try you'll see why.

> 
> Careful Mike btw KIS and KAS are two different mods, you want to use KIS. As for wobbly ports, I guess that's a good point. KIS isn't fussy about what type of node you use, so you could get away with no docking ports at all, and just sticking a node at each end. If people want to dock, they can use the CBM ports or something, and if not they can use KIS to node attach. be aware that if you choose to use KIS, you'll likely want to include support for adding KIS inventories to some of the parts; maybe the quest airlock? Not saying to do this right away, but if you give KIS a try you'll see why.

Yes kas seperated into yhe newer kis didnt they.

I was liking the inventory idea for the modules I made for the orbiter so you have a way to transport small parts up to the station. Tools or struts or addons etc...

What I can do is make it how it was use 'dock ports'but have a simple module manager patch for those who want to add the ability of using KIS for rigidity and extra functions...? So that way no extra dependencies unless you want it.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-15T20:50:13Z" title="07/15/2015 08:50  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 15, 2015</time> by Mike-NZ**
  
Typos
Can you just make sure that parts can correctly dock and undock? The PMAs and Shuttle have had trouble with that in the past, either not docking, or not undocking.

> 
> Can you just make sure that parts can correctly dock and undock? The PMAs and Shuttle have had trouble with that in the past, either not docking, or not undocking.

Yes will remember to check

I believe the undocking thing may have been a bug on KSP's part actually in prior versions, so it might not show up now. Either way, it'll be difficult to find until the parts get a bit of use in-game, and even then the fix is just going into the config and changing some values. It was more an issue with how docking ports worked rather than a fault of the parts, so I don't think it's something we need to worry about right now.

> 
> I believe the undocking thing may have been a bug on KSP's part actually in prior versions, so it might not show up now. I don't know if this has been suggested before, but I think a cool addition to the shuttle model would be the Ku-band antenna. This could work as a transmission device since the shuttle doesn't have one, or there could be some sort of Remote Tech implementation. Here's a picture a reference is needed:
